name: Grimoire - Puzzles & Monsters
description:
Grimoire - Puzzles & Monsters, is a neat little puzzle platformer, where you push blocks, pick up and use items, and defeat enemies, to continue on to the next level.

You control Moira, a young girl who is in search of her father, who used to be a great adventurer, who during his recent travels, never returned.

Go through 3 different areas with many puzzles in each one, on your quest to find your lost father!

(Tech demo is rather glitchy at the moment, but updates will come soon)

Controls:

Z - Jump

Hold X - Push/Pull boxes

A, or S - Start

Credits:

Music - CosmicGem and m9m

Pixel art - PixelEric

Programming - NinjaMan Z
